Left/Right arrows and powerful climate change imagery

Jan 23, 2017

After refactoring and rewriting quite a few things, Diego and I got the left and right arrows working for Stash.

Stash Left/Right Arrows Demo

Things are coming along and we will be pushing an update in the near future.

I also did some research on climate change today and found a great climate change website that has accumulated some compelling imagery. The creators conducted research about each image's effectiveness is conveying global warming.

Here are some examples:

Air Pollution China

Nigerian Oil Fire

Child and E-Waste

These images are disturbing and more people should see them. Find the rest of the pics and the research behind them here.
